Models supported by Omnia:
* Ethernet 10G 4P X710/I350 rNDC
* Ethernet Converged Network Adapter X710
* 25GbE Ethernet Network Adapter E810
* 100GbE Ethernet Network Adapter E810
* I350GbE Ethernet Controller

* ConnectX-5 Single Port 100 GbE QSFP+
* ConnectX-5 Single Port 0 GbE QSFP
* ConnectX-5 Single Port 56 GbE QSFP+
* ConnectX-5 Ex 100 GbE QSFP
* ConnectX-6 Single Port VPI HDR QSFP
* ConnectX-6 Single Port VPI HDR 100 QSFP
* ConnectX-7 NDR/NDR200 Adaptor
* Network Adapter (10 Gb)
Models validated with current version of:
* ConnectX-6 Single Port VPI HDR QSFP
* ConnectX-6 Single Port VPI HDR 100 QSFP
* ConnectX-7 NDR/NDR200 Adaptor

.. note:: The latest firmware for Connect X6 and X7 models has not been validated.
